title: The Corpse Danced at Midnight
description: The film loosely based on the 1984 bestselling murder-mystery by J.B. Fletcher and ultimately left unfinished due to its own murder scandal.
altHero: a woman in a neon graveyard
alt1: a woman in a neon graveyard
alt2: dancing corpses approach the woman in the graveyard
alt3: a blonde man embraces the woman
alt4: the man and woman look at each other
